messages.message:
Copied over the scheduler test assigned to @Abhishek Adupa
Need to update the tags and test.

The flow-scheduler system tests run in a separate test suite/branch, example (https://prod.jenkins.instabase.com/job/tests/job/system-tests/job/master/4425/consoleFull) (dogfood-flow-scheduler)

@Cody Boggs /@Yash Botadra Can you confirm if I need more changes to add a test suite, so that it runs alongside with “release-24.07.0-enterprise” — draft PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/67601)

@Abhishek Adupa your PR looks good. You’ll need to send another one similar to Pridhvi’s PR (https://github.com/instabase/jenkins-pipeline-shared/pull/165) to make sure it gets triggered with the other suites.
